author: foobar0x
content: Just posted a new EIP, would love feedback! https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-4672-account-nonce-opcode/8171

author: killari.
content: not sure how that would help against sybil attacks, you can generate addreses with any nonce by spamming the network

author: foobar0x
content: No, because to have nonce 100 you must have 100 transactions land on-chain

author: killari.
content: yeah, so its expensive for users.
